data.description: Communicate with Nessus scanner via XMLRPC
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is Perl interface for communication with Nessus scanner over
    XMLRPC. You can start, stop, pause and resume scan. Watch progress
    and status of scan, download report, etc.

    As old (NTP based) protocols are obsolete, this CPAN module
    implements new XMLRPC protocol which Nessus is now using.
